member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions
member.summary: Provides the extension methods to register and configure modules in a host ASP.NET MVC application.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.EnableCodeRouting(System.Web.Mvc.ViewEngineCollection)
member.summary: Enables namespace-aware views location. Always call after you are done adding view engines.
member.param: The view engine collection.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.EnableCodeRouting(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerBuilder)
member.summary: Sets a custom implementation that provides a more direct access to the controller types for routes created by MvcCodeRouting. It enables a scenario where routes are created for controllers that are dynamically loaded at runtime.
member.param: The controller builder.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.BindRouteProperties(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerBase)
member.summary: Binds controller properties decorated with using the current route values.
member.param: The controller to bind.
member.remarks: You can call this method from .

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.MapCodeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates routes for the specified root controller and all other controllers in the same namespace or any sub-namespace, in the same assembly.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The route controller for the application.
member.returns: The created routes.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.MapCodeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.Type,MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings)
member.summary: Creates routes for the specified root controller and all other controllers in the same namespace or any sub-namespace, in the same assembly.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
The route controller for the application.
A settings object that customizes the route creation process. This parameter can be null.
member.returns: The created routes.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.MapCodeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates routes for the specified root controller and all other controllers in the same namespace or any sub-namespace, in the same assembly, and prepends the provided base route to the URL of each created route.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
A base route to prepend to the URL of each created route. This parameter can be null.
The route controller for the provided base route.
member.returns: The created routes.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingExtensions.MapCodeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Type,MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings)
member.summary: Creates routes for the specified root controller and all other controllers in the same namespace or any sub-namespace, in the same assembly, and prepends the provided base route to the URL of each created route.
member.param: A collection of routes for the application.
A base route to prepend to the URL of each created route. This parameter can be null.
The route controller for the provided base route.
A settings object that customizes the route creation process. This parameter can be null.
member.returns: The created routes.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.CustomRouteAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to customize the URL for the decorated action method or controller class.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.CustomRouteAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to customize the URL for the decorated action method or controller class.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CustomRouteAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided URL pattern.
member.param: The URL pattern. Constraints can be specified using the on the action method parameters or controller class properties.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CustomRouteAttribute.Url
member.summary: The URL pattern.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.CustomRouteAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided URL pattern.
member.param: The URL pattern. Constraints can be specified using the on the action method parameters or controller class properties.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.CustomRouteAttribute.Url
member.summary: The URL pattern.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.DefaultActionAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to specify which action method should be treated as default action, which means making the action segment of the URL optional.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.FromRouteAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to mark action method parameters and controller properties, whose values must be bound using . It also instructs the route creation process to add route parameters after the {action} segment for each decorated action method parameter, and after the {controller} segment for each decorated controller property.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute
member.summary: Represents an attribute that is used to mark action method parameters and controller properties, whose values must be bound using . It also instructs the route creation process to add route parameters after the {action} segment for each decorated action method parameter, and after the {controller} segment for each decorated controller property.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.
member.param: The name of the route parameter.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.GetBinder
member.summary: Gets the model binder used to bind the decorated parameter or property.
member.returns: The model binder.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.BindModel(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Web.Mvc.ModelBindingContext)
member.summary: Binds the decorated parameter or property to a value by using the specified controller context and binding context.
member.param: The controller context.
The binding context.
member.returns: The bound value.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the route parameter name. The default name used is the parameter or property name.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.TokenName
member.summary: Gets or sets the route parameter name. The default name used is the parameter or property name.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.Constraint
member.summary: Gets or sets a regular expression that specify valid values for the decorated parameter or property.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.CatchAll
member.summary: true if the parameter represents a catch-all parameter; otherwise, false. This setting is ignored when used on controller properties.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.FromRouteAttribute.BinderType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the binder.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.Web.Mvc.RequireRouteParametersAttribute
member.summary: An for overloaded action methods, used to help the ASP.NET MVC runtime disambiguate and choose the appropriate overload.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.RequireRouteParametersAttribute
member.summary: An for overloaded action methods, used to help the ASP.NET MVC runtime disambiguate and choose the appropriate overload.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.RequireRouteParametersAttribute.IsValidForRequest(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the action method selection is valid for the specified controller context.
member.param: The controller context.
Information about the action method.
member.returns: true if the has values for all parameters decorated with , and if all keys in match any of the decorated parameters, excluding controller, action and other route parameters that do not map to action method parameters.

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.RouteDebugHandler
member.summary: Serves representations of the routes in for visualization and debugging purposes.

member.summary: Serves representations of the routes in .
member.param: The HTTP context.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.RouteDebugHandler.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.RouteDebugHandler.DefaultFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the default format that the handler should use. Valid values are: "csharp", "vb".

member.name: T:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings
member.summary: Specifies a set of features that affect the way modules are exposed in a host application.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the values from the property.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.#ctor(MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the values from the provided settings instance.
member.param: Another instance to copy the settings from.

member.name: M:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.Reset
member.summary: Resets the members of the settings class to their original default values, that is, the values from the property before any changes were made.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.Defaults
member.summary: The settings that all new instances inherit. Use this property to affect the behavior of the MapCodeRoutes methods without having to pass a settings instance for each call.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.DefaultConstraints
member.summary: Gets default constraints used for route parameters that represents action parameters and controller properties.
member.remarks: Consider using instead, for a more flexible constraining mechanism.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.ParameterBinders
member.summary: Gets the default binders used for route parameters that represent action parameters and controller properties.
member.remarks: This collection includes default binders for , , , , , , , , , , , and .

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.IgnoredControllers
member.summary: Gets a collection of controller types that must be ignored by the route creation process.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.RouteFormatter
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate for custom route formatting.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.EnableEmbeddedViews
member.summary: true to look for views embedded in assemblies.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.UseImplicitIdToken
member.summary: true to include an {id} route parameter for actions with a parameter named id.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.RootOnly
member.summary: true to create routes for the root controller only.

member.name: P:MvcCodeRouting.CodeRoutingSettings.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that is associated to each created route as a data token named 'Configuration'. Use to provide configuration settings to controllers.
